prompts: Create a playful fire-type Pokemon that loves to run around and play in grassy fields.
I want a cute bunny Pokemon with orange fur and white spots, known for its speed and agility.
Generate an energetic starter Pokemon that has a fiery personality and enjoys outdoor adventures.
Make a rabbit-like Pokemon that is small and nimble, with bright colors and a friendly demeanor.
Imagine a fire-themed Pokemon that can leap great distances, featuring a mix of orange and cream shades.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, characterized by its warm colors and lively spirit.
Give me a small, adorable Pokemon with distinctive long ears and a warm smile that radiates enthusiasm.
